item.title: Personal Knowledge Management Systems
item.description: Desired Features WYSIWYG/Live Preview Editing Plugins (Integrations, Expansion) Attachments Selective Publishing Collaborative Features Existing Apps Open Source Logseq Pros Very Fast Cons Everything’s an outline Athens Research Similar to Logseq (Roam clone), but database based
